name: Paws Off!
description:
This was our first Trijam and our first game jam together - and we loved it! We had some doubts what we'd be able to accomplish within 3 hours, but this is almost exactly what we had envisioned, so we're psyched!

Created for Trijam #172 in 3 hours by:

Aidan, Coach, Quinn

Made using the Unity engine.

All artwork, sounds, code and design was made by us during the 3 hours!
